summary: Two men make the dangerous journey from Africa to Italy for a better life, but then face hostility and violence in this shocking look at the life-and-death struggle of refugees.
cast: Koudous Seihon|Alassane Sy|Adam Gnegne|Mary Elizabeth Innocence|Pio Amato|Zakaria Kbiri|Davide Schipilliti|Vincenzina Siciliano|Joy Odundia|Ousman Yabre|Francesco Papasergio|Annalisa Spirli|Mimma Papasergio|Norina Ventre|Ernest Zire|Soulemane Aboulaye|Annalisa Pagano|Serigne 'Chico' Baity Kane|Sinka Bourehima|Tofo Sarato Zanre Yabre|Naciratou Zanre|Bruno Mbiene|Souleyman|Didier Njikam|Mervy Dieu|Badri Abdelkader B. Wannas|Ider Amalouk|Aisha|Michele Bovalino|Gerardo Saverino|Bilal Fall|Regina|Fallou Fall|Paolo Sciarretta|Susannah Amato|Enzo Ila|Rocco Galati|Cosimo Galati|Luigi Piromalli|Leonardo D'Antoni|Albert Serpeti|Carmine Gerace|Rihanna
title: Mediterranea
